name: MKGeodesicPolyline
desc: An open polygon overlay made of line segments that follow the contours of the Earth to create the shortest path between the specified points.

items.name: init(points: UnsafePointer<MKMapPoint>, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates and returns a geodesic polyline using the specified map points.

items.name: init(coordinates: UnsafePointer<CLLocationCoordinate2D>, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates and returns a geodesic polyline using the specified coordinates.
